channel.title: lcollado on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in lcollado on Academic

item.title: CDSBMexico: remember to apply for BioC2019 travel scholarships
item.description: About 10 months ago we announced our plans to start a new community of R/Bioconductor developers in Mexico and Latin America. The National Bioinformatics Node (NNB-UNAM in Spanish) has organized workshops in bioinformatics and R since 2006 and more frequently since 2010. Last year, 2018, there were five simultaneous one week workshops: Introduction to R and RStudio Exploratory data analysis (EDA) of biological data with R EDA of RNA-seq data and differential expression studies

item.title: R Gene Regulatory Interaction Formulator For Inquiring Networks
item.description: _This blog post was contributed by: ME Martinez-Sanchez, S Muñoz, M Carrillo, E Azpeitia, D Rosenblueth_ In this blog post we will describe the package rGriffin that was one of the projects developed during the TIB2018-BCDW. We hope to continue developing Griffin and rGriffin. If you have ideas, suggestions or bugs, please contact us at Github. The problem Boolean networks allow us to give a mechanistic explanation to how cell types emerge from regulatory networks.
